title: wipro tier
content: Is wipro which is offering ctc of 5.5lpa +1 lakh retention bonus after one year a tier 3 or tier2 .If get offer will not be able to attend other better tier 2 companies.

comments.body:
tier 1: >12 lakhs  
tier 2: 6-12 lakhs  
tied 3: <6 lakhs

​

Since the total CTC Wipro is offering appears to be 6.5 LPA I think it is classified as a tier 2 company. If you get the offer from Wipro you will only be able to sit for Tier 1 companies  after receiving the offer. (assuming that Wipro would be your first job offer from placements and not your second.)
